page.description: Writes pointer contents to a file.

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The path and name of the file to create.

argument.name: pointer
argument.description: A pointer variable containing the data to write.

page.discussion: The FILE.FROM_PROPERTY() method creates a property file from a dot variable.
page.example: Dim a[1] as P a[1].name = "Fred" a[1].city = "Boston" a[1].age = 23 a[].name = "Tom" a[..].city = "NY" a[..].age = 35 file.From_property("c:\my_property.txt", a)
